text: Thank you to Hui Ru and team frm 2LT Glass & Mirror aluminium Contract. My enquiries were replied very promptly. The team came to measure deligently and it was fixed just a few days later. The quality of the mirror was also tip top with a proper and careful installation. Highly recommended.
Salesperson is very responsive and attentive to details. The contractor also came and install the door fast. All in all, they done a perfect job which exceeded my expectations.

We came with just the measurements.... but Ms Loh took the time attending to us and give us a recommended measurement and through her assessment...it came out a good fit.
Well done Ms Loh I will definitely recommended to my family and friends if they needed some glass work
Thank You Ms Loh.

I need to absolutely thank 2LT Glass & Mirror Aluminium for their top notch service. From the prompt responses to my queries to their efficient service installing two shower screens for our toilets. 2LT was able to resolve a mistake on my part where the measurement was taken before my toilet contractors laid the steel piping. However, the workers managed to workaround this by customising the frames so that it doesn’t affect the overall look to the frame. Both Hui Ru and the team of installers have to be commended. 5 ⭐️

Our 20 yo glass top for our desk broke and I walked around the AMK industrial estate looking for a glass supplier. Don’t visit the missing glass suppliers shown in Google and just head straight to 2LT Glass. They are efficient and provided great value for our replacement. Thank you Hui Ru!!!
